entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • vstest command no longer allows multiple loggers #30034
  • Resolve issues with testing 8.0 templates in SDK repo #30033
  • Dotnet Build fails, trying to copy "files" referencing old dotnet user-secrets #30020
  • [ARM64]After installing the .NET 8.0 SDK and running "dotnet workload install wasm-tools-net6" using the command line will meet: "workload ID wasm-tools-net6 is not supported on this platform". #30019

Closed

  • Cannot restore NuGet packages with dotnet restore command #30027
  • NETSDK1109 \ #29600
    Discussion
  • Unable to build macos binaries on linux #29955
  • Disable inclusion of IIS hosting assets (ANCM & web.config) in publish output when PublishNativeAot=true #29896

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30031
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for destructor and explicit interface implementation generation. #30030
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • Add support for EnableRequestDelegateGenerator flag #29982
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2092396 #30009
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use better AOT defaults in Web SDK #29984
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Mention that preview SDKs in VS needs to be turned on in the dev guide #29870
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30006
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30013
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure Blazor startup succeeds #29899
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
